Class PlayerCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject.MapObject
      • com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject.Creature
        • com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject.PlayerCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combatant, Global

    public class PlayerCharacter
extends Creature
implements Combatant
    PlayerCharacter is currently designed to be unique per game TODO: Implement "World owner" as the main target instead of player, so that several players can coexist in a single game
    Author:
    nkoiv
